title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1868/91 of 28 June 1991 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1106/90 on the communication of information for the purposes of the common organization of the market in fishery products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1868/91  of 28 June 1991  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1106/90 on the communication of information for the purposes of the common organization of the market in fishery products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1991. For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 282, 2. 10. 1989, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 111, 1. 5. 1990, p. 50.
